options.title: -d, --delimiter=DELIM
options.description: use DELIM instead of TAB for field delimiter

options.title: -d, --delimiter=DELIM
options.description: use DELIM instead of TAB for field delimiter

options.title: -f, --fields=LIST
options.description: select only these fields; also print any line that contains no delimiter character, unless the -s option is specified

options.title: -f, --fields=LIST
options.description: select only these fields; also print any line that contains no delimiter character, unless the -s option is specified

options.title: --complement
options.description: complement the set of selected bytes, characters or fields

options.title: -s, --only-delimited
options.description: do not print lines not containing delimiters

options.title: -s, --only-delimited
options.description: do not print lines not containing delimiters

options.title: --output-delimiter=STRING
options.description: use STRING as the output delimiter the default is to use the input delimiter

options.title: -z, --zero-terminated
options.description: line delimiter is NUL, not newline

options.title: -z, --zero-terminated
options.description: line delimiter is NUL, not newline

options.title: -M
options.description: from first to M'th (included) byte, character or field
